text:
Hello,

Is there a way I can pass a testing/internal traffic flag against tracking and any user interaction of a site / related resources?

I canâ€™t find away to exclude or separate myself or other team members activity with content from campaigns, reports and analytics

I see there is a way to add additional page data to the tracking code

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/reports/install-the-HubSpot-tracking-code#additional-code-to-bucket-data-into-HubSpot-page-types>

I wonder if it would be possible to send an additional value with tracking code perhaps triggered by detecting a cookie value (set by HubSpot or google tag manager)

```var _hsq = window._hsq = window._hsq || [];
_hsq.push(['setInternalTraffic', checkInternalTrafficCookie()]);```
Or perhaps even simpler would be if a user is known to HubSpot and is either a registered HubSpot,
For non-registered contacts where the email address *has ever been* one a number of declared email domains
